# trait

## Index

- [OpsRule](#opsrule)


## Schemas

### OpsRule

OpsRule describes operation rules for various Day-2 Operations. Once declared, these operation rules will be checked before any Day-2 operations.

#### Attributes

**maxUnavailable**

`int | str`

The maximum percentage of the total pod instances in the component that can be
simultaneously unhealthy.
